snippet.title: Super Mario Bros. Extreme Adventure Direct 2024 | What's New?
snippet.description:
------------------------------------------------------------------
Super Mario Bros. Extreme Adventure Direct 2024 | What's New?
------------------------------------------------------------------
Ladies and Gentleman! On the 6th August, 2024 at 19:00PM (UTC+2), This First Experimental Direct will start with
so much new stuff and news about our mod! We enormously thanks the entire Horizon Discord Server Community for the support
and the other people that created incredible stuff and custom features for the community that you will also see implemented on our project!
Of course, No other versions of the DEMO will be released after this one anymore. Since the Full Version is the high priority for we, Developers.
We decided to upload this new one to fix some bugs of the previous v1.3 and Improved so much stuff on the levels like decorations and other stuff!
Having said that, between criticisms and compliments, We are happy to give you a first look to this new content Project-Centered and a nice permanence also on our Official Discord Server. Thank you for the reading!
- Mone and The Team Alternative
------------------------------------------------------------------
- SOCIAL AREA -
------------------------------------------------------------------
Discord: https://discord.gg/V5PTrf2f9N
------------------------------------------------------------------
- DOWNLOAD AREA -
------------------------------------------------------------------
Github: https://github.com/TeamAlternative2023/SMBEA/releases/tag/relase1.301
------------------------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANTE:
Questa MOD non è affiliata a Nintendo o al Team Newer, 
per quanto abbiamo utilizzato il loro materiale: non intendiamo guadagnare denaro e fama. 
Mario, Luigi e tutti i personaggi all'interno
del gioco sono per Copyright ©Nintendo.
ma speriamo unicamente che vi piaccia giocare a tale MOD.
Per qualsiasi dubbio o bug, contattateci mediante i nostri social, buon gameplay ;).
Si ringrazia enormemente gli aiuti ricevuti dal server Discord e sito web di Horizion Miraheze.
Non sosteniamo la Pirateria

IMPORTANT:
This MOD is not affiliated with Nintendo or Team Newer, 
for what we have used their material: we do not intend to earn money and fame. 
Mario, Luigi and all the characters inside
of the game are for Copyright ©Nintendo.
but we only hope you enjoy playing that MOD.
For any doubts or bugs, contact us via our social networks, good gameplay ;).
We thank enormously the help received from the server Discord and website of Horizion Miraheze.
We not endorse Piracy
